page.title: 16LEISURE FACILITIES CUCKFIELD
page.content: Although there is no sports centre there are many sports facilities. On the Cuckfield to Ansty road is a cricket club. At Ansty is a social club offering snooker and darts with facilities for soccer and cricket. At Whiteman's Green on the Cuckfield to Staplefield road are one soccer, 3 rugby, 2 hockey pitches and a running track all used by local teams. In London Lane is a youth club held on Mondays, Wednesdays and Thursdays. Warden Park School is used by many clubs after school hours and offers metalwork, gym, badminton, keep fit, soccer. In Cuckfield itself is a park with tennis club, soccer pitch and children's play area. There are 8 public houses within the area. All serve food and one offers accomodation. There are 2 hotels. In the High Street is a library/museum.
